sentences.sContent: The indiscriminate use of fertilizers is damaging to the environment.
sentences.sCn: 化肥的滥用化正在损害环境。

synos.tran: 任意的；无差别的；不分皂白的

trans.tranCn: 不加选择的； 随意的， 任意的
trans.tranOther: If you describe an action as indiscriminate, you are critical of it because it does not involve any careful thought or choice
